name: Silent Hope
description:
Explore, fight, and create items to grow stronger as seven distinct heroes in the tragic world of Silent Hope. This isometric dungeon-crawler harkens back to the glory days of action RPGs but with a modern flair. Guided by The Princess, you’ll delve into The Abyss and learn the mysteries of this now-ruined kingdom.

Travel between The Abyss and Base Camp as your heroes grow stronger. Comb the dangerous floors below to collect treasures and materials, then return to your sanctuary to create new items to aid in your quest. Equip yourself with gear you’ve made to take down the throngs of fearsome foes that await you in the treacherous void. What hope is there in a world without words? You.
